meanings.definition: A subset of a larger series.
meanings.sent1: The first subseries of the book focused on the main character's childhood.
meanings.sent2: The subseries of paintings by the artist showcased different landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The subseries of jokes in the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Each subseries of the TV series represented a different chapter in the main character's life.
meanings.sent5: The subseries of photographs captured the beauty of nature in different seasons.

meanings.definition: A smaller series within a larger series.
meanings.sent1: The subseries of episodes within the TV show explored various plotlines.
meanings.sent2: In the subseries of novels, each book focused on a different character.
meanings.sent3: The subseries of experiments in the lab led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: Each subseries of events in the story added a new layer of complexity.
meanings.sent5: The subseries of puzzles in the game challenged players with increasing difficulty.
